      • Conference

        public Conference(java.lang.String alocation,
          java.lang.String adate,
          java.lang.String adeadline,
          User apc,
          java.lang.String aname)
        This method serves as the constructor for the Conference class.
        Parameters:
        alocation - A string representing the location of the conference
        adate - A string representing the date the conference takes place
        adeadline - A string representing the deadline for this conference
        apc - A user that is assigned the program chair position
        aname - The name of this conference
